             <a class="oct-link oct-link--theme-text oct-color--boots-blue teaser-wrapper-link" href="https://www.boots.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/SearchDisplay?langId=-1&amp;showResultsPage=true&amp;categoryId=&amp;sType=SimpleSearch&amp;searchTermScope=&amp;orderBy=&amp;resultCatEntryType=2&amp;minPrice=0&amp;promoNameParam=1%2F2+price+on+No7+Line+Correcting+Booster+Serum+-+Online+Only&amp;catalogId=28501&amp;pageView=grid&amp;advancedSearch=&amp;searchTerm=&amp;storeId=11352&amp;beginIndex=0&amp;maxPrice=&amp;isPromoLink=Y&amp;searchSource=Q&amp;manufacturer=">

               <div class="oct-teaser__background" style="background-color:#f2f2f2">

               <div class="oct-teaser__contents oct-teaser__contents--has-foreground-image" style="background-color:#f2f2f2">
                <div class="oct-teaser__contents-panel">

             <div class="oct-grid oct-aem-grid" columns="12" data-testid="grid" largecolumns="12">
              <div class="oct-grid__row oct-grid__row--full-width" data-testid="row">
               <div class="oct-grid__cell oct-grid__cell--width-12 oct-grid-aem__cell oct-grid-aem__cell__width--firstRow oct-grid-aem__cell__width--lastRow" data-testid="cell">
                <div class="oct-htmlSlot" data-testid="inner-html">
                 <style type="text/css">
                  #shop_safe_row a {
  background: #C6E5E1;
  color: #10034D;
  text-align: center;
  display: block;
  width: 100%;

  font-size: .88rem;
  text-decoration: none !important;
  font-family: "Boots Sharp",Arial,sans-serif;
}

    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
   margin-top: -20px;
}

  display: block;
  width: auto;
  height: auto;
  margin: 0 auto;
  width: 100%;
}

    margin-top: 5px;
    display: block;
}

  max-width: 138px;
}

  max-width: 288px;
}

@media all and (max-width: 800px) {

    font-size: .84rem;

  }

    width: 100%;
